titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding the human rights situation in Cuba, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 3/26/2003--Introduced. Calls on the Cuban Government to release immediately all prisoners of conscience, including those detained in March 2003, and to provide its citizens with internationally-accepted standards for civil, political, and human rights, and the opportunity to vote in free and fair elections.
